title: Which music award is the best? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would say it would be the Diamond record, or more accurately, to have a record certified Diamond by the RIAA (Recording Industry Association of America). To have a Diamond record, means that you have sold at least 10,000,000 copies. As of 2016, only 92 albums have held this distinction, and now with streaming, it seems that the Gold/Platinum/Diamond Certification—as we knew it—will be going the way of the dodo.
